bookmark.description: State Next Player Turn / End game animation

list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment: Place/Move/Remove influence did not return militarySenateActions and did not add them to the stack.

task.summary: Swap Building action: added possibility for the active player to select a progress token
Update draftpool after discarding an available card in case a card behind it needs to be revealed first
Fixed tooltips quirks with svg hotspots, by using a data attribute as selector.
Fixed strings not being translatable. Differentiated Decree 10/11 text
Bugfix $payment being null when moving a non-military decree
gameoptions.inc.php testing options default to no
Fixed conspiracy peek not being visible during prepare animation.
Added more game_display images for Agora
Typo bugfix, military pawn not moving on Place Influence > Military Decree
Added senate section icons in tooltips.
Bugfixes: - Clear Insider Influence borders if the second step is skipped. - Fixed Skip button not becoming visible to opponent after you use Insider Influence Conspiracy
Added Political Supremacy stat Yes/No labels
Fixed Decree 12 rule misinterpretation Added Curia Julia "trigger unprepared conspiracy" tooltip text
Fixed long button texts turning into ..., now the buttons wrap (Prepare conspiracy first, then discard button).
Point out color in text description of Decrees (request by Pierre).
Added further explanation to the Politician / Conspirator tooltips.

Bugfixes: - whenusing ConstructBuildingFromLastRow, you couldn't make a science symbol pair (state transition). - when constructing another card, it would skip the player's normal turn after the triggered conspiracy.
Initialize VALUE_STATE_STACK value... game breaking bug, especially now the player turn uses the stack.
Update draftpool at start of military token senate actions, so any new available cards are revealed.
Update draftpool at start of military token senate actions, so any new available cards are revealed.
Allow state transition from chooseDiscardedBuilding to Game end debug

Fixed animations not happening for spectators when only using notifyPlayer twice, now we do notifyPlayer for the active player and notifyAllPlayers for the rest, were in that last notification we check for the active player and ignore it.
Added animation for keeping both Conspiracies when having Progress Token 12
Fixed STATE_CHOOSE_OPPONENT_BUILDING not working if the military shield of the same wonder (9/12) would trigger a military token.

MESSAGE.value: Added senate section icons in tooltips.
Updated game_display1.jpg, removed red hue
Bugfixes: - Clear Insider Influence borders if the second step is skipped. - Fixed Skip button not becoming visible to opponent after you use Insider Influence Conspiracy
Added Political Supremacy stat Yes/No labels
Added remove influence transition
addSituation mechanism
Fixed Decree 12 rule misinterpretation Added Curia Julia "trigger unprepared conspiracy" tooltip text
Fixed long button texts turning into ..., now the buttons wrap (Prepare conspiracy first, then discard button).
Measure performance of update "situation" methods
Point out color in text description of Decrees (request by Pierre).
Added further explanation to the Politician / Conspirator tooltips.

Bugfixes: - whenusing ConstructBuildingFromLastRow, you couldn't make a science symbol pair (state transition). - when constructing another card, it would skip the player's normal turn after the triggered conspiracy.
Initialize VALUE_STATE_STACK value... game breaking bug, especially now the player turn uses the stack.
Cube size increase
Update draftpool at start of military token senate actions, so any new available cards are revealed.
Added construct conspiracy animation.
Added ChooseConspireRemnantPosition animation.
keep both conspiracies animation WIP
Lock progress notification WIP
Allow state transition from chooseDiscardedBuilding to Game end debug

Fixed animations not happening for spectators when only using notifyPlayer twice, now we do notifyPlayer for the active player and notifyAllPlayers for the rest, were in that last notification we check for the active player and ignore it.
Improved text
Replaced "this.getActivePlayerId() == this.player_id" with "this.isCurrentPlayerActive()"
Added animation for keeping both Conspiracies when having Progress Token 12
Fixed STATE_CHOOSE_OPPONENT_BUILDING not working if the military shield of the same wonder (9/12) would trigger a military token.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Fixed STATE_CHOOSE_OPPONENT_BUILDING not working if the military shield of the same wonder (9/12) would trigger a military token.
